import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import setAlert from '../../action/aleart'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import BusNotFound from './BusNotFound'; const buses = ({ setAlert, register }) => { let travelDate = localStorage.getItem('travelDate'); travelDate = new Date(travelDate) const month = travelDate.toLocaleString('default', { month: 'short' }) const date = travelDate.getDate() return ( {buses.length === 0 ? ( ) : (
{buses.map((bus) => (

{bus.agency.agencyName}

{bus.busName}
{bus.busType}/ {bus.seatCategory}
{bus.arrivalTime}
{bus.from.city}, {bus.from.state}
{date} {month}
{bus.departureTime}
{bus.to.city}, {bus.to.state}
Fare
Rs {bus.fare}
Total 52 seats left
27 window seats
Select Seats

{bus.policy}

{ bus.images.map(image => ( )) }
Awesome
Driver : {bus.driver.name}
Helper: {bus.helper.name}
Emergency No: {bus.agency.phone}
))}
)} ) } export default connect(null, { setAlert })(buses);
